name: Kraken Priest
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

special_abilities.name: Amphibious.
descriptions: The priest can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The priest's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

descriptions.raw: At will: command, create or destroy water
descriptions.hyperlinked: At will: command, create or destroy water

descriptions.raw: 3/day each: control water, darkness, water breathing, water walk
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3/day each: control water, darkness, water breathing, water walk

descriptions.raw: 1/day each: call lightning, Evard's black tentacles

actions.name: Thunderous Touch.
descriptions: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 27 (5d10) thunder damage.

actions.name: Voice of the Kraken (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
descriptions: A kraken speaks through the priest with a thunderous voice audible within 300 feet. Creatures of the priest's choice that can hear the kraken's words (which are spoken in Abyssal, Infernal, or Primordial) must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
